mapper.select: select ID,CAR_NUMBER,CAR_TYPE,VIN,NOW_PLACE,REMIAN_POWER,IS_USED,USER_NAME,ID_CARD from (select a.* from (select c.*, 1 as IS_USED, u.USER_NAME as USER_NAME,u.ID_CARD as ID_CARD from car c, user u where c.DEL_FLAG = '0' and c.ID in ( select CAR_ID from car_use_record where CAR_ID = c.ID and car_use_record.USE_STATE = '1' and car_use_record.DEL_FLAG = '0' ) and u.ID in ( select USER_ID from car_use_record where CAR_ID = c.ID and car_use_record.USE_STATE = '1' and car_use_record.DEL_FLAG = '0' )) a union all select * from (select c.*, 0 as IS_USED, '无' as USER_NAME,'无' as ID_CARD from car c where c.DEL_FLAG = '0' and c.ID not in ( select CAR_ID from car_use_record where CAR_ID = c.ID and car_use_record.USE_STATE = '1' and car_use_record.DEL_FLAG = '0' )) b ) d where d.IS_DESTROIED = '0' and not exists(select * from car_repair_record repair where repair.CAR_ID = d.ID and (repair.REPAIR_STATE = '1' or repair.REPAIR_STATE = '0' ) and repair.DEL_FLAG = '0') order by d.IS_USED desc ,d.REMIAN_POWER ASC limit #{current},#{pageSize};

select ID, CAR_NUMBER, CAR_TYPE, VIN, IS_DESTROIED, NOW_PLACE, REMIAN_POWER, USER_NAME, ID_CARD from ( select c.*,'无'as USER_NAME,'无' as ID_CARD from car c where c.IS_DESTROIED = '1' and c.DEL_FLAG = '0' union all select c.*,u.USER_NAME,u.ID_CARD from car c,user u where c.DEL_FLAG = '0' and c.IS_DESTROIED = '0' and exists(select * from car_repair_record r where r.DEL_FLAG = '0' and(r.REPAIR_STATE = '1' or r.REPAIR_STATE = '0' ) and r.CAR_ID = c.ID) and u.ID = (select r.USER_ID from car_repair_record r where r.DEL_FLAG = '0' and(r.REPAIR_STATE = '1' or r.REPAIR_STATE = '0' ) and r.CAR_ID = c.ID) ) re order by re.IS_DESTROIED desc limit #{current},#{pageSize};

select ID,CAR_NUMBER,CAR_TYPE,VIN,NOW_PLACE,REMIAN_POWER,IS_USED from( select c.*, 0 as IS_USED from car c where c.DEL_FLAG = '0' and not exists ( select * from car_use_record where car_use_record.CAR_ID = c.ID and car_use_record.USE_STATE = '1' and car_use_record.DEL_FLAG = '0' )
) d where d.IS_DESTROIED = '0' and not exists(select * from car_repair_record repair where repair.CAR_ID = d.ID and (repair.REPAIR_STATE = '1' or repair.REPAIR_STATE = '0' ) and repair.DEL_FLAG = '0') and d.REMIAN_POWER > 20 order by d.IS_USED desc ,d.REMIAN_POWER ASC limit #{current},#{pageSize};
